edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model.Thing
      • edu.southalabama.csc527.smallworld.model.Player

  • public final class Player
extends Thing
    An avatar that is controlled by, and represents, the user of the game. At present there is one Player roaming around per World instance.
